original_text: Then the goat became exceedingly great, but when he was strong, the great horn was broken, and instead of it there came up four conspicuous horns toward the four winds of heaven.
korean_text: 숫염소가 스스로 심히 강대하여 가더니 강성할 때에 그 큰 뿔이 꺾이고 그 대신에 현저한 뿔 넷이 하늘 사방을 향하여 났더라

sentences.original_text: Then the goat became exceedingly great
and instead of it there came up four conspicuous horns
sentences.korean_translation: 그것 대신에 네 개의 두드러진 뿔이 올라왔으니

sentences.original_text: toward the four winds of heaven
